mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO catch_record_tb ( name, img_address, money, create_date, update_date, status, goods_id, acount_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{imgAddress}, #{money}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{status}, #{goodsId}, #{acountId})
mapper.update: UPDATE catch_record_tb SET name=#{name}, img_address=#{imgAddress}, money=#{money}, create_date=#{createDate}, update_date=#{updateDate}, status=#{status}, goods_id=#{goodsId}, acount_id=#{acountId} WHERE catch_record_id=#{catchRecordId}
mapper.select: SELECT recharge_record_id, name, img_address, money, create_date, update_date, status, goods_id, acount_id FROM catch_record_tb WHERE recharge_record_id=#{catchRecordId}
